      • evaluate

        public static double evaluate(int totalOnA,
                              int totalOffA,
                              int totalOnB,
                              int totalOffB)
        Return the odds ratio for two datasets.
        Parameters:
        totalOnA - number of passes for dataA
        totalOffA - number of passes for dataB
        totalOnB - number of failures for dataA
        totalOffB - number of failures for dataB
        Returns:

      • evaluateMatched

        public static double evaluateMatched(int onAoffB,
                                     int onBoffA)
        Return the matched odds ration, used when the two datasets are paired.
        Parameters:
        onAoffB - number of pairs in which the sample from dataA passes and the sample from dataB fails
        onBoffA - number of pairs in which the sample from dataB passes and the sample from dataA fails
        Returns:
